thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 11 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment To Acquire Dangdang.com And Related Firm for 7.5 Bln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment To Acquire Dangdang.com And Related Firm for 7.5 Bln Yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - tianjin tianhai investment co ltd

text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BUY BEIJING-BASED DANGDANG AND RELATED E-COMMERCE FIRM FOR A COMBINED 7.5 BILLION YUAN ($1.19 billion) VIA CASH, SHARE ISSUE
* SAYS IT PLANS TO RAISE UP TO 4.06 BILLION YUAN IN SHARE PRIVATE PLACEMENT TO FUND ACQUISITION, PROJECTS
* SAYS SHARE TRADE REMAINS SUSPENDED Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HrZDto Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2815 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
